name: RightorWrong
0:
”Alexa, open right or wrong”
”Alexa, start right or wrong”
”Alexa, launch right or wrong”
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: right or wrong
Developer Terms of Use
des:
"Right or Wrong" is an Alexa skill designed to test one's general knowledge through a quiz game.

Users are asked general statements to which and must respond with a “right” or “wrong” answer.

Each time the user guesses, he or she earns a point. Every ten questions, the user's score is announced.

The multiplayer mode supports up to two players.

In the multiplayer mode, every 20 answers the players' scores will be revealed.

Try the multiplayer mode, challenge your family and friends and find out who will be the winner!!! 

Have fun!
priv:
Developer Privacy Policy
The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
